note:
I'm Martin, a software engineer helping NGOs with the tech side of their projects.

I started WRKS as my side project in a movement to build a platform-less network where artists can focus on quality and supporters get a chance to build their own indie label.

I love to talk #tech, so you'll hear about my progress here or at my Czech account @mwenisch (Use @IceCubesApp for translations)

note:
Alaskan music producer/teacher/fan. I especially love vocal pop, rock, retrowave, and adjacent genres. I play keys and guitar. He/him.

Love is not a zero-sum game.
A rising tide lifts all boats.

My artist name is a reference to nagoonberries, a rare Alaskan berry. No reference to the movie Blue Lagoon intended; I haven't seen it and hear it's quite problematic!
